00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "LambdaTarget.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 LambdaTarget::LambdaTarget( TargetCalculator* lambda_source,
00041                             TargetCalculator* composite_source )
00042   : lambdaSource(lambda_source), compositeSource(composite_source)
00043   {}
00044 
00045 LambdaTarget::~LambdaTarget()
00046   {}
00047 
00048 bool LambdaTarget::get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00049                                   size_t element,
00050                                   Sample sample,
00051                                   MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00052                                   MsqError& err )
00053 {
00054   bool valid = lambdaSource->get_3D_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00055   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) && !valid)
00056     return false;
00057   double det1 = det(W_out);  
00058 
00059   valid = compositeSource->get_3D_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00060   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) && !valid)
00061     return false;
00062   double det2 = det(W_out);  
00063   
00064   if (det2 < 1e-15) 
00065     return false;
00066   
00067   W_out *= Mesquite::cbrt( fabs( det1/det2 ) );
00068   return true;
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool LambdaTarget::get_2D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00072                                   size_t element,
00073                                   Sample sample,
00074                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00075                                   MsqError& err )
00076 {
00077   bool valid = lambdaSource->get_2D_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00078   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) && !valid)
00079     return false;
00080   double det1 = det( W_out );
00081 
00082   valid = compositeSource->get_2D_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00083   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) && !valid)
00084     return false;
00085   double det2 = det( W_out );
00086   
00087   if (det2 < 1e-15) 
00088     return false;
00089   
00090   W_out *= sqrt( det1/det2 );
00091   return true;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 bool LambdaTarget::get_surface_target( PatchData& pd, 
00096                                   size_t element,
00097                                   Sample sample,
00098                                   MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00099                                   MsqError& err )
00100 {
00101   bool valid = lambdaSource->get_surface_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00102   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) && !valid)
00103     return false;
00104   MsqVector<3> cross = W_out.column(0) * W_out.column(1);
00105   double det1 = cross % cross; // length squared
00106 
00107   valid = compositeSource->get_surface_target( pd, element, sample, W_out, err );
00108   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) && !valid)
00109     return false;
00110   cross = W_out.column(0) * W_out.column(1);
00111   double det2 = cross % cross; // length squared
00112   
00113   if (det2 < 1e-15) 
00114     return false;
00115   
00116   W_out *= sqrt( sqrt( det1/det2 ) );
00117   return true;
00118 }
